mapper.insert: insert into tb_promise(writer_idx, title, content) values (#{writerIdx}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_promise WHERE use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY idx DESC, sysregdate DESC
